amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En bloc No. 1: 3, 7, 9, 10, 11, 16, 17, 19, 20, 22, 23, 25, 26, 34, 35, 47, 48, 49, 58, and 79 printed in House Report 115-297.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A060) offered by Mr. Calvert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Calvert amendments (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A060) offered by Mr. Calvert.
